text: The Farming and Irrigation Artifacts Museum () is a museum in Linnei Township, Yunlin County, Taiwan. ==Exhibitions== The museum exhibits traditional irrigation techniques and their history. ==Transportation== The museum is accessible within walking distance north of Linnei Station of Taiwan Railways. ==See also== * List of museums in Taiwan ==References== Category:Museums established in 2016 Category:2016 establishments in Taiwan Category:Museums in Yunlin County
title: Farming and Irrigation Artifacts Museum
